field.label: Enable
field.help: This will activate the routing service. Without enabling it globally, none of the individual services will run.

field.label: Profile
field.help: Control FRRâ€™s default profile: traditional reflects defaults adhering mostly to IETF standards or common practices in wide-area internet routing. datacenter reflects a single administrative domain with intradomain links using aggressive timers.

field.label: Enable CARP Failover
field.help: This will activate the routing service only on the master device. The backup device will stop the service completely.

field.label: Enable SNMP AgentX Support
field.help: This will activate support for Net-SNMP AgentX.

field.label: Enable logging
field.help: Sends logs to the OPNsense integrated syslog-ng service.

field.label: Log Level
field.help: This is the detail level of the log. A higher level means more data is logged.

field.label: Firewall rules
field.help: Enable automatically created firewall rules, when additional policies are needed, disable this and define your own custom policies in the Firewall section.
